name: code-analyser
description: Production-ready code and document analysis with RAG

scripts.setup: npm run setup:node && npm run setup:python
scripts.setup:node: cd mcp && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.setup:python: cd rag && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: cd mcp && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.index: cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python indexer.py --repo ../repo --docs ../docs
scripts.index-code: cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python indexer.py --repo ../repo --only code
scripts.index-docs: cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python indexer.py --repo ../docs --only docs
